item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, September 16, 2024 at 9:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. FBI probes second apparent Trump assassination attempt
2. Harris shores up lead over Trump on economy after debate
3. Roche data shows stomach-churning side effects of weight-loss drugs
4. Berlin blindsided after JPMorgan asked UniCredit to bid for Commerzbank stake
5. Philippines withdraws from disputed reef in South China Sea
